Class DashVodRendererBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.DashVodRendererBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.exoplayer.util.ManifestFetcher.ManifestCallback<com.google.android.exoplayer.dash.mpd.MediaPresentationDescription>, ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder

    public class DashVodRendererBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder, com.google.android.exoplayer.util.ManifestFetcher.ManifestCallback<com.google.android.exoplayer.dash.mpd.MediaPresentationDescription>
    A ExoplayerWrapper.RendererBuilder for DASH VOD.

      static int ALLOWED_JOINING_TIME_MS

      Performs android.media.MediaDrm key and provisioning requests.

      The maximum number of frames that can be dropped between invocations of onDroppedFrames(int, long).

      Contains the ExoPlayer which will use this renderer builder to play a video.

      Constant indicating that first Widevine security level.

        private static final int SECURITY_LEVEL_UNKNOWN
        Constant indicating that the Widevine security level is unknown. This constant must be an int instead of part of an enum because it has significance in the Exoplayer library.

      • getSdRepresentations

        private com.google.android.exoplayer.dash.mpd.Representation[] getSdRepresentations(com.google.android.exoplayer.dash.mpd.Representation[] representations)
        Iterate through each of the representations and return an array of all representations which are standard definition (less than 720 x 1280).
        Parameters:
        representations - A set of representations which include the format widths and heights.
